title: Chloe Moretz shows off platinum hair on Instagram
title_page: Chloe Moretz shows off platinum hair on Instagram | Daily Mail Online
text:
She debuted a fresh new hairdo Wednesday evening revealing a chic bob cut.
Now Chloe Grace Moretz has taken it a step further showing off newly-dyed platinum blonde hair to Instagram on Thursday.
The 20-year-old actress took to the social media account flashing her lighter shade locks to her 12.7 million Instagram followers.
Scroll down for video
Going platinum! Chloe Grace Moretz showed off her lighter shade locks on Thursday after dying it a platinum blonde
In her Instagram video, the actress filmed herself at Lorri Goddard's studio, a stylist who has also worked with stars including Reese Witherspoon and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley.
She threw on an animal filter as she sat in the salon chair while waiting for her hair to be colored.
In the next shot, Chloe debuted her new look with the caption, '@lorrigoddard you're a genius.'
The Kick-Ass star also tagged Gregory Russell at Andy LeCompte's studio on Wednesday after her hair cut- a place where clientele including Madonna, Fergie, Katie Holmes and Megan Fox have frequented.
'You're a genius': The 20-year-old star tagged celebrity stylist Lorri Goddard after getting her hair colored
Changes! This comes after The 5th Wave star cut her hair shorter the day before
Wait and see...: Lori Goddard has worked with celebrities including Reese Witherspoon and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley
Moretz had been spotted Sunday last heading out to run a few errands, her hair seeming slightly longer and wavier than it did come Wednesday.
Trapezoidal black sunglasses were sat on her face, and she'd flung a black Adidas jacket streaked with white stripes over a loose black top.
Skintight Oxford blue leggings emphasized the shape of her legs, and she'd completed the ensemble with a pair of white-fringed black shoes.
'Shh': The star used her favorite puppy filter as she could not stop flaunting her freshly-dyed hair for her fans
New hair, who dis: Chloe is welcoming the arrival of spring with a new 'do
Courtesy of Gregory Russell: Chloe revealed via her Instagram Story on Wednesday night that she'd treated herself to a brand new hairdo
Showing it off: A brief black and white video saw her swinging her bob - which appeared to have been slightly shortened as well as straightened - to and fro
Next month will see the release of Moretz' new film November Criminals, which sees her star opposite Ansel Elgort and Catherine Keener.
Sacha Gervasi - who'd directed Alfred Hitchcock biopic Hitchcock, starring Anthony Hopkins as the director and Helen Mirren as his wife - made November Criminals.
Out April 7, it also stars Good Night And Good Luck leading man David Strathairn and is based on a 2010 crime novel written by Sam Munson.
Augmenting the look: The 20-year-old Kick-Ass actress had fixed a pout to her face and added a filter that stuck a dog's snout over her mouth and canine ears above her forehead
